name: Evangelion Shin Gekijouban: 3nd Impact
summary: Evangelion New Theatrical Edition: 3nd Impact (with "3nd" being pronounced as "sound", it is pun on Third Impact) is a rhythm-action video game for the PlayStation Portable console. It is an adaptation of the anime Neon Genesis Evangelion`s Rebuild of Evangelion movie series, namely 1.0 and 2.0, and was designed by Grasshopper Manufacture.
